title: Verify: Modular ralph.zsh works end-to-end
description:
Verify the modular ralph.zsh split (MP-004) and layered prompts (MP-005) work correctly.

Test scenarios:
1. Fresh shell sources all modules correctly
2. All ralph-* commands work (ralph-status, ralph-session, ralph-logs, etc.)
3. repoGolem creates functions correctly
4. Story-type prompts are injected correctly
5. A full ralph iteration completes successfully
6. Pre-commit hooks still run all tests

acceptanceCriteria.text: Fresh shell: source ralph.zsh, verify all functions exist
Test US-* story gets US.md prompt injected
Test BUG-* story gets BUG.md prompt injected
Test V-* story gets V.md prompt injected
Run one full ralph iteration on a test story - completes
Pre-commit hook runs all tests successfully
Document any gaps found in docs.local/modular-ralph-audit.md
Run CodeRabbit review - must pass (or create BUG if unfixable)
